| History                 = Robowerx was a robotics company purchased by [[Baintronics Incorporated (Earth-616)|Baintronics]]. In retaliation to the pro-robots campaign of the [[A.I. Army (Earth-616)|A.I. Army]], [[Sunset Bain (Earth-616)|Sunset Bain]]'s partner [[Arno Stark (Earth-616)|Arno Stark]] had her blow up Robowerx's factory on live TV in the middle of its production of a new batch of A.I.s in order to goad the A.I. Army and draw them out.{{r|Iron Man 2020 Vol 2 1}}
